name: fall cuddler throw blanket
sizes_available: one size though it's easily adjusted to any size
notes:
**this pattern is available to view in it's entirety for free through the link here on ravelry.** there is also an ad-free, printable version available on etsy. thank you and enjoy!

description: 

wrap yourself up in a warm, fall cuddle.  a beautiful variety of stitching, texture, and lofty yarn make this blanket fun to knit and super cozy to curl up with. easy enough for advanced beginners and fun enough for any level. enjoy!

materials:

us size 15 (10 mm), 36” circular knitting needles

7 skeins lion brand yarn wool ease thick & quick in oatmeal 170 g/skein

  pattern uses approximately 1190 grams

scissors

tapestry needle to weave in ends

sizes: lapghan 45” x 45”  if you're experienced, you can easily make this any size you'd like. see the "notes" section on how to adjust the size. 

hope you enjoy it!
